1000011110110101 0101000101000011 0 -> sum: 1101100011111000, cout: 0
0100011000001010 1010001001101110 0 -> sum: 1110100001111000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
